attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: This app caused made my grandma late bc it was nighttime and my sister was late for her birthday bc we celebrated it yesterday and my Dinosaur said yes so I finally remembered to turn off the beans but then I remembered I had to die so I skated to my house and drop my car keys but then I realized my phone died so I charged it on my hat, in conclusion this app sucked and Apple pls take it down

attributes.title: GREAT!!!
attributes.review: All the reviews are just hate but if you are looking for a good app to tell you all the TRUE updates and info on Trump and the U.S this is a great app :)

attributes.title: Made my phone freak outüò°üò°
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone randomly started glitching and then stopped working for 2 HOURS! It took me forever to delete the app as I kept getting blocked by pop up adds for Russian mail order brides. I am severely disappointed with the quality of this app and strongly suggest NEVER DOWNLOADING!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: This has made my phone a LIVING HELL. Non-stop notifications EVEN when I turn them OFF, constant glitching making my phone shut down every time I open it, everything is so slow. THIS NEEDS TO BE TAKEN DOWN! As soon as I installed it for 5 minutes I immediately uninstalled! Never have been so disappointed
